Plot: Here is the magical legend of King Arthur, vividly retold through the eyes and lives of the women who wielded power from behind the throne. A spellbinding novel, an extraordinary literary achievement, THE MISTS OF AVALON will stay with you for a long time to come....
Characters: Morgause, Igraine, Viviane, Uther, Gorlois, Morgaine, Gwenhwyfar, Merlin, Kevin, the Bard, Lancelet, Uriens, Accolon, King Arthur
